Class NotificationController

java.lang.Object
controllers.NotificationController
public class NotificationController extends Object
Controller responsible for sending notifications to customers.

This controller handles all customer communication including reservation confirmations, reminders, table availability alerts, billing notifications, and cancellation notices. Notifications are simulated via the ServerUI interface, which displays messages to demonstrate email and SMS delivery.

Version:
1.0
Author:
Yamen Abu Ahmad

    • sendReservationCanceledDueToNoShow

      public common.dto.Notification.NotificationResult sendReservationCanceledDueToNoShow(int reservationId) throws SQLException
      Sends a no-show cancellation notification to the customer.

      This notification is sent when a reservation is automatically cancelled because the customer did not arrive within the grace period.

      Parameters:
      reservationId - the ID of the cancelled reservation
      Returns:
      the result of the notification attempt
      Throws:
      SQLException - if a database error occurs

    • sendReservationMovedToWaiting

      public common.dto.Notification.NotificationResult sendReservationMovedToWaiting(int reservationId) throws SQLException
      Sends a notification when a reservation is moved to the waiting list.

      This can occur when restaurant capacity changes affect existing reservations.

      Parameters:
      reservationId - the ID of the affected reservation
      Returns:
      the result of the notification attempt

      SQLException - if a database error occurs

    • buildMessage

      public static String buildMessage(common.enums.NotificationType type, String name, LocalDateTime dateTime, Integer guests, Integer confirmationCode, Double amountBefore, Double finalAmount)
      Builds a notification message based on the notification type and parameters.
      Parameters:
      type - the type of notification
      name - the customer's name
      dateTime - the reservation date/time (if applicable)
      guests - the number of guests (if applicable)
      confirmationCode - the confirmation code (if applicable)
      amountBefore - the amount before discount (for billing)
      finalAmount - the final amount after discount (for billing)
      Returns:
      the formatted notification message
